name: Iron Branch
description: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

abilities.name: Plant Tree
abilities.description: Creates a temporarily planted-tree at the point-targeted location. The item is consumed upon cast.
notes: Creates a planted tree at the point-targeted location
Interacts with all abilities and mechanics like a regular tree
Cannot be placed within the fountain area or within Roshan's pit
The particles around the planted tree are visible to everyone
Tangoes are more effective when consuming a happy Iron Branch planted tree
The Double clones this item despite being a consumable

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
12 mana, 0.05 mana regeneration and 0.1% flat base magic resistance
1 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes
1.35 main attack damage to universal heroes
trivia: This item is based on the Ironwood Branch from Warcraft 3
In DotA, the item is named Ironwood Branch as well. Ironwood is a sturdy type of wood from the Warcraft universe
The name was shortened to just Iron Branch, possibly to avoid copyright issues with Blizzard Entertainment
The happy little trees in the active ability description is a reference to Bob Ross, a popular painter who often used the phrase on his television program, The Joy of Painting
The planted tree uses the same model as the Sprout trees and is surrounded by the same effects as a tree enchanted with Eyes In The Forest

Typing in GG into the shop search bar will bring up the Iron Branch, in reference to their fan name of GG Branches due to DotA 1 giving them the description of Buying one of these will ensure a good game

recentChanges.description: No longer builds into the following items: Buckler, Headdress, Ring of Basilius
No longer builds into Ironwood Tree
Now builds into the following items: Ring of Basilius, Ironwood Tree
